keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

// Link hints
# useful on, e.g., youtube, where map `f` is deactivated
map <c-f> LinkHints.activateMode

# Move tabs left/right
# Source: https://github.com/philc/vimium/issues/2526#issuecomment-307554116
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight

map sh moveTabLeft count=50 # send tab to start
map sl moveTabRight count=50 # send tab to end

# more convenient tab navigation
map h previousTab
map l nextTab

map g1 firstTab
map g2 firstTab count=2
map g3 firstTab count=3
map g4 firstTab count=4
map g5 firstTab count=5
map g6 firstTab count=6
map g7 firstTab count=7
map g8 firstTab count=8

# remap original h/l to H/L
# map H scrollLeft
# map L scrollRight

# equivalent maps for g0/g$
map gh firstTab
map gl lastTab


# Convenient Vomnibar
# swap o and O mappings
map o Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map O Vomnibar.activate

# swap b and B mappings
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarks

# Scroll full page up/down
# swap d/u with <c-d>/<c-u>
map e scrollFullPageDown
map q scrollFullPageUp
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map d scrollFullPageDown
map u scrollFullPageUp

# Shortcuts to search engines
# source: https://github.com/philc/vimium/wiki/Tips-and-Tricks#keyboard-shortcuts-for-custom-search-engines
map <c-a> Vomnibar.activate keyword=a # amazon
map <c-g> Vomnibar.activate keyword=g # google
map <c-i> Vomnibar.activate keyword=i # imdb
map <c-s> Vomnibar.activate keyword=s # so
map <c-w> Vomnibar.activate keyword=w # wikipedia
map <c-y> Vomnibar.activate keyword=y # youtube
map <c-l> Vomnibar.activate keyword=l # libgen
map a Vomnibar.activate keyword=l # libgen

# close current tab
map ZZ removeTab
searchEngines:
a: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s amazon

g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s google

i: http://www.imdb.com/find?s=all&q=%s imdb

l: http://libgen.is/search.php?&res=100&&req=%s&phrase=1&view=simple&column=def&sort=year&sortmode=DESC libgen

s: http://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s stackoverflow

w: https://www.walmart.com/search?q=%s walmart

# w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
